info.title: NFL v2 Baker Predictive
info.description: NFL projections, best bets and trends.

get.description: Returns the most recent 100 changelog events that triggered new simulation runs.
Returns the projected game and team outcomes for a given game.

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The SportsDataIO GameId for the game desired. This value is a number.

get.description:
Returns the average projected statsistics for the top 50 players sorted by the sort_by parameter.

Can be filtered by game_id, team, and position.

To retreive all players efficiently, use the /team endpoint or the /stat endpoint and call them for each team or statistic required.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

get.description: Returns the average projected statistic for up to 500 players sorted in descending order.
get.summary: BAKER Player Projections Week Average Single Statistic

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: The name of the statistic desired. Example: rushing_attempts

get.description: Returns the percentile of the projected statistic for up to 500 players sorted in descending order.
get.summary: BAKER Player Projections Week Percentile Single Statistic

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: The name of the statistic desired. Example: rushing_attempts

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: The desired percentile for the distribution of the projections. Example: 90

get.description: Returns the average projections for all players on the specified team.
get.summary: BAKER Player Projections Week Average Per Team

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: The Key indicator of the team desired. Example: NE

get.description: Returns a percentile of projections for all players on the specified team.
get.summary: BAKER Player Projections Week Percentile Per Team

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: The Key indicator of the team desired. Example: NE

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: The desired percentile for the distribution of the projections. Example: 90

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

get.summary: BAKER Weekly Best Bets Game Picks

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

parameters.name: week_number
parameters.description: The name of the week. Example: 16

post.description: The advanced query engine powered by Baker, allowing for conditional queries. See the Advanced Query documentation for more details.

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The GameId of the event. This GameId is the SportsDataIO GameId.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body sent to tell the BAKER API which fields to return and the conditions to use when filtering.

get.description: Returns the average full-season projections for all players. Does not change after the season starts.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: Available values : 2025REG, 2024REG, 2024POST, 2023POST, 2023REG, 2022POST, 2022REG

get.description: Returns the average projected statistics for the fantasy defense
get.summary: BAKER Fantasy Defense Projections Week Average

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: Available values : 2025REG, 2024REG, 2024POST, 2023POST, 2023REG, 2022POST, 2022REG

get.description: Returns the full-season fantasy ceiling projections for all players. Does not change after the season starts.
get.summary: BAKER Player Full-Season Projections Fantasy Ceiling

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

get.description: Returns the full-season fantasy floor projections for all players. Does not change after the season starts.
get.summary: BAKER Player Full-Season Projections Fantasy Floor

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

get.description: Returns the rest-of-season fantasy ceiling projections for all players. Changes as the season progresses.

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

get.description: Returns the rest-of-season fantasy floor projections for all players. Changes as the season progresses.
get.summary: BAKER Player Rest-of-Season Projections Fantasy Floor

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG

get.description: Returns the rest-of-season fantasy ceiling projections for all players. Changes as the season progresses.
get.summary: BAKER Player Rest-of-Season Projections Fantasy Ceiling

parameters.name: season_name
parameters.description: The name of the season. Examples: 2022REG
